text: Shapeshifting is the act of being able to change into another being or form. Treatise on Invisible Beings Creatures of the Night The idea of shapeshifting has been around since the Middle Ages. It has been used in literature and epic poems, including works such as Peleus and Thetis and the Iliad. The trend of shapeshifting is still being done today.
